cause.description:
Or Hadash, is the Jewish Federation of Greater Orlando's Young Professionals Group.
Proceeds of donations go to Or Hadash in order to support our fun and unique Jewish programming, community building, outreach and leadership development efforts.
Through all that we do, we are working hard to cultivate a new generation of leaders and board members for Orlando's Jewish Community. Our efforts are designed to involve unaffiliated young Jewish people in the greater Orlando area and to provide a variety of social, educational, cultural, philanthropic and spiritual programming.
www.orhadashorlando.com
1. We're creating future Jewish leaders.
2. We strengthen Jewish identity.
3. We encourage community building.
cause.mission: We create a broad range of social, educational, philanthropic and leadership activities as a means of enhancing commitment and connection to Orlando's Jewish community.
cause.name: Or Hadash - Orlando's Jewish Young Professionals Group
